language.entry: Produce a random supply Item or search for Herbs

A mushroom used in shamanic rituals. It provides insight about the true nature of the world. Heal {colour_start|white}Stress{colour_end}. Be wary inisght might also cause {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end} trips

A mushroom used in shamanic rituals. It provides insight about the true nature of the world. Heal {colour_start|white}Stress{colour_end}. Be wary inisght might also cause {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end} trips
Rare Mushroom growing on exotic wood. It emmits a purple bloodlike sap. Despite its look it is able to cure {colour_start|mortaldebuff}Mortality Debuffs{colour_end}.
Use to treat poison and open wounds. Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}/{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end}.
Salve made out of purple mossclumps. Use to soak out poison from wounds. Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}.
Use to soak up blood from open wounds. Cure {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end}.
Fresh Berrys found in the wilds. Use to increase your resistances.
The Riftwatchers use this for their brotherhood ritual. These leaves are sharp like metal. Throw them to {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} your foes.
A bunch of rotten leftovers. Throw them to {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} your foes.
A sticky liana, severed from a flesh eating plant. Throw to {colour_start|debuff}Debuff:{colour_end} SPEED & DODGE
This common fruit emmits an awful smell of rotting flesh. Despite this it has {colour_start|healhp}medicinical use{colour_end}. Be wary some of them are {colour_start|blight}poisonous{colour_end} !
This common fruit emmits an awful smell of rotting flesh. Despite this it has {colour_start|healhp}medicinical use{colour_end}. Be wary some of them are {colour_start|blight}poisonous{colour_end} !
Ghosttrees are nearly invisible. Breaking the branch emmits a cloud of white ghastly mist. {colour_start|stealth}Stealth{colour_end} (2rds)
The Watchers of the Legion learned to craft flutes out of wild Cattail-gras. The mild Melody {colour_start|virtue}clears Horror and heals Stress{colour_end}
Rare seed of a long extinct tree. A spirit-guide resides in it. Use to {colour_start|surprised}prevent any ambush{colour_end} (quest), or sell it for a good price
Blossom found in clear waters, it has a strong rejunevating effect. Grants two{colour_start|notable} additional Combat Actions {colour_end}
Bud of a soon blossoming herb found in clear waters, it has a rejunevating effect. Grants an{colour_start|notable} additional Combat Action {colour_end}
Fungus mutants use these glowing spores to tag their enemys. Throw them to {colour_start|mark}Mark {colour_end} & {colour_start|stealth}Destealth{colour_end} the enemy group.
A glowing branch of an Eerie Coral. Use to remove {colour_start|mark}Marks{colour_end} & {colour_start|debuff}Debuffs{colour_end} from your party
Rare wood emmiting a calming odour. Use to clear {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end} from your party

It is the rarest amongst all flowers, only growing upon corpses. It withers within seconds if exposed to light. {colour_start|notable} Use during combat to recover from any ailments, or sell it for precious amount of gold.{colour_end}
Rare Butterfly, emmiting glowing dust from its wings, to keep of predators. Release to fully light the Dungeon, and prevent {colour_start|surprised}party surprised{colour_end}.
Some consider this as odd weed. Used in the right way consumption provides stress relief by the cost of SPEED & ACC
Strange overgrown slab found beneath some moss. Someone engraved a map and some hints about the environment into it.
This seemingly dried root, inflates upen coming in contact with water. Eat it to saturate the hero until the end of the journey .
Flamable substance, extracted from plants. Attach this to your weapon to hunt beasts and vampires.
Poisonous sap, wich dilutes the blood. Attach this to your weapon to increase {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}&{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} chance.
Black resin gathered from corrupted plants. Attach this to your weapon to deal increased damage against humans and in low light.
Glowing resin, used for holy rituals. Attach this to your weapon to deal increased damage against unholy and in high light.
Strange substance, extracted from the twisted wildlife. Attach this to your weapon to hunt eldritchs and ignore armour.
Heavy sap that shines like molten led. Attach this to your weapon to increase {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end}&{colour_start|move}Move{colour_end} chance.

A mushroom used in shamanic rituals. It provides insight about the true nature of the world. Heal {colour_start|white}Stress{colour_end}. Be wary inisght might also cause {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end} trips

A mushroom used in shamanic rituals. It provides insight about the true nature of the world. Heal {colour_start|white}Stress{colour_end}. Be wary inisght might also cause {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end} trips

Some consider this as odd weed. Used in the right way consumption provides stress relief by the cost of SPEED & ACC
Strange overgrown slab found beneath some moss. Someone engraved a map and some hints about the environment into it.

Inedible berrys, glowing in ll coours of the prism. Use to mark your way to prevent{colour_start|surprised}Backtraging Stress{colour_end}, or throw them to disable{colour_start|surprised} Traps{colour_end}
This seemingly dried root, inflates upen coming in contact with water. Eat it to saturate the hero until the end of the journey .

Poisonous sap, wich dilutes the blood. Attach this to your weapon to increase {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}&{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} chance.

A mushroom used in shamanic rituals. It provides insight about the true nature of the world. Heal {colour_start|white}Stress{colour_end}. Be wary inisght might also cause {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end} trips
Rare Mushroom growing on exotic wood. It emmits a purple bloodlike sap. Despite its look it is able to cure {colour_start|mortaldebuff}Mortality Debuffs{colour_end}.
Use to treat poison and open wounds. Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}/{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end}.
Salve made out of purple mossclumps. Use to soak out poison from wounds. Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}.
Use to soak up blood from open wounds. Cure {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end}.
Fresh Berrys found in the wilds. Use to increase your resistances.
The Riftwatchers use this for their brotherhood ritual. These leaves are sharp like metal. Throw them to {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} your foes.
A bunch of rotten leftovers. Throw them to {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} your foes.
A sticky liana, severed from a flesh eating plant. Throw to {colour_start|debuff}Debuff:{colour_end} SPEED & DODGE
This common fruit emmits an awful smell of rotting flesh. Despite this it has {colour_start|healhp}medicinical use{colour_end}. Be wary some of them are {colour_start|blight}poisonous{colour_end} !
This common fruit emmits an awful smell of rotting flesh. Despite this it has {colour_start|healhp}medicinical use{colour_end}. Be wary some of them are {colour_start|blight}poisonous{colour_end} !
Ghosttrees are nearly invisible. Breaking the branch emmits a cloud of white ghastly mist. {colour_start|stealth}Stealth{colour_end} (2rds)
The Watchers of the Legion learned to craft flutes out of wild Cattail-gras. The mild Melody {colour_start|virtue}clears Horror and heals Stress{colour_end}
Rare seed of a long extinct tree. A spirit-guide resides in it. Use to {colour_start|surprised}prevent any ambush{colour_end} (quest), or sell it for a good price
Blossom found in clear waters, it has a strong rejunevating effect. Grants two{colour_start|notable} additional Combat Actions {colour_end}
Bud of a soon blossoming herb found in clear waters, it has a rejunevating effect. Grants an{colour_start|notable} additional Combat Action {colour_end}
Fungus mutants use these glowing spores to tag their enemys. Throw them to {colour_start|mark}Mark {colour_end} & {colour_start|stealth}Destealth{colour_end} the enemy group.
A glowing branch of an Eerie Coral. Use to remove {colour_start|mark}Marks{colour_end} & {colour_start|debuff}Debuffs{colour_end} from your party
Rare wood emmiting a calming odour. Use to clear {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end} from your party

It is the rarest amongst all flowers, only growing upon corpses. It withers within seconds if exposed to light. {colour_start|notable} Use during combat to recover from any ailments, or sell it for precious amount of gold.{colour_end}
Rare Butterfly, emmiting glowing dust from its wings, to keep of predators. Release to fully light the Dungeon, and prevent {colour_start|surprised}party surprised{colour_end}.
Some consider this as odd weed. Used in the right way consumption provides stress relief by the cost of SPEED & ACC
Strange overgrown slab found beneath some moss. Someone engraved a map and some hints about the environment into it.

Inedible berrys, glowing in ll coours of the prism. Use to mark your way to prevent{colour_start|surprised}Backtraging Stress{colour_end}, or throw them to disable{colour_start|surprised} Traps{colour_end}
This seemingly dried root, inflates upen coming in contact with water. Eat it to saturate the hero until the end of the journey .
Flamable substance, extracted from plants. Attach this to your weapon to hunt beasts and vampires.
Poisonous sap, wich dilutes the blood. Attach this to your weapon to increase {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}&{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} chance.
Black resin gathered from corrupted plants. Attach this to your weapon to deal increased damage against humans and in low light.
Glowing resin, used for holy rituals. Attach this to your weapon to deal increased damage against unholy and in high light.
Strange substance, extracted from the twisted wildlife. Attach this to your weapon to hunt eldritchs and ignore armour.
Heavy sap that shines like molten led. Attach this to your weapon to increase {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end}&{colour_start|move}Move{colour_end} chance.
